channel.title: User Lifecycle Management (LCM) :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: User Lifecycle Management (LCM) Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Description: An overview of lifecycle management, and why we care about it, or at least why Enterprise app vendors care about it, and what that means for developers who need to incorporate it. Add emphasis on user provisioning and deprovisioning in this doc. Also mention LCM apps in the OIn catalog.

item.title: SCIM
item.description: System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM) Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Description: An high-level overview of SCIM and how it powers LCM. THis is a rework of the current SCIM concept doc, that then provides links to the Plan > Build a SCIM App and the Build > Manage User Accounts > Manage a Users Lifecycle > SCIm section (ID: 474)

item.title: SCIM with entitlements
item.description: SCIM with entitlements Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Description: an introductory overview of what entitlements are and how they extend SCIM Structure type: Concept Content type: Conceptual overview Conceptual overviews present a high-level introduction to a topic. Such high-level overviews provide developers with a broad understanding of the system’s workings. Deeper discussions into single topics are called Explanations.
